data.author: Grant Pozzana
data.description:
A simple, clean analogue watchface with second hand, day of week, battery meter, bluetooth connectivity indicator and digial time display.

Days of the week in English only.
data.title: Simple Elegance

data.author: Noah
data.description: A simple, digital, retro and energy saving watchface for your pebble.
data.title: Digital Live

data.author: C. Munkelt
data.description:
This watch face displays the time in a minimalistic, battery preserving fashion. The display gets refreshed only every eighth of an hour. The inner number shows the hour, the outer indicator the approximate time.

Thanks to Ten by Twenty for their marvelous font "Jura".
data.title: Uncertainty Time

data.author: Dr. Antonio Aguilera.
data.description:
36 Watchfaces (Yes, thirty six) that change every 15 min and/or with a "tap" or a "shake".

Check out my "Muchos(Menu)" app for a menu controlled version of these watchfaces with tons of options.

36 Relojes distintos (SÃ­, treinta y seis) que cambian cada 15 min y/o con un "tap or shake".
data.title: Muchos(Auto/Tap)

If youâre loving the font you can grab all of its 14 segments at once and for free on fm1.colon-three.net!

data.description:
ì§ê¸ ëª ìì§? This app helps with reading the time in Korean íê¸. The time is written out rather than using number symbols. Practice reading the time in Korean!

Top line is AM/PM, left justified
Second line is the Hours, left justified
Third line is Minutes, right justified
Forth line is Seconds, right justified

You can create your own korean watchface: https://github.com/deoryp/pebble-korean

data.author: Andrew Jazbec
data.description:
12hr/24hr depending on user setting
Shake to show battery
data.title: Simplified

data.author: P1X

changelog.release_notes:
v.3 feature: 
- gentle vibe every full hour to aware user to get from the chair for a moment
Feature request: show time on shake (time will disappear after 1250ms)

data.description:
This watch face do not show any time. It represents my philosophy of life that time does not matter. 

Dedicated to my girlfriend :)

Features:
- clean & minimalistic look
- gentle vibe every full hour to aware user to get from the chair for a moment 
- (request feature) show time on shake (will disappear after 1250ms)
- battery saver (do not refresh screen until shaken)

latest_release.release_notes:
v.3 feature: 
- gentle vibe every full hour to aware user to get from the chair for a moment

data.title: Time Is Limitless

data.author: ShaBP

changelog.release_notes:
Added steps count view for iPhone 5s and above
Cleaned and fixed formatting.
Improved phrasing of time to next event

data.description:
The best iPhone companion if you like classic digital watch design. All the info you need at a glimpse, including steps count measured on iPhone 5s/6/6+. Set target steps on Smartwatch Pro WatchApp, see % from target on WatchFace.

Shake/Tap to see next event/appointment.

Credits to oviwan for 91 Dub v2 and for Fowler for the great Smartwatch Pro iPhone companion app.
data.title: 91 DUB PRO

data.author: Gilad S.

changelog.release_notes:
- Added an option to invert background when bluetooth is connected
- Added an option to hide separation line

- Improved design of the big 7 number
- Bug fixes
- Moved settings page to new hosting

- added option to swap date day and month numbers
- consumes less battery now
- hourly vibrate from before 00:00 to after 00:00 now works.

- fix menu image
- fix vibrate on Bluetooth connected/disconnected not working bug

- added option to vibrate on Bluetooth connected and disconnected
- changed 1 digit appearance in bottom info (with option to revert this change)
- added option for long vibrate for hourly vibration
- fixed background doesn't change bug
- added settings to control which info to hide on shake

- added option to invert background on shake
- settings page UI imporovements

- added settings to choose which numbers to show
- fixed applying settings to Pebble bug
- performance improvements

- 01:00 PM crash bug fixed
- Added support for system's built in time format chooser

data.description:
This Watchface uses less lines as possible to mark the time.
The lines separate between the digits and parts in the digits to make them look like actual digits.
The big digits change with animations

There are settings for:
- Watchface color
- Bluetooth connectivity information
- Hourly vibrate in specific time period everyday
- Time format(12/24-hour)
- Which info to show
- Much more...

latest_release.release_notes:
- Added an option to invert background when bluetooth is connected
- Added an option to hide separation line

data.title: Minimal Time

data.author: unexist
data.description:
This is a just a weird concept watchface.

It shows the current hour in a wheel and the current minutes and seconds with slider-like hands. The filled hand is for minutes, the outlined one for seconds. It also shows the current day and month.

History:

v1.1 - Bugfixes for hour and weekday display
v1.0 - Initial release
data.title: Hands

data.author: Maurizio Ramondo

changelog.release_notes: Invert colors and choice font tapping pebble in 20 seconds.

data.description:
It shows time using a big single character. Easily to see also in the dark, it shows hour in a big hex char (0-9 and A for 10 and B for 11) and minutes filling the character with grey color.
To invert colors or change font, just tap or shake pebble watch within 20 seconds after the watchface starts.
There are 4 fonts available.

latest_release.release_notes: Invert colors and choice font tapping pebble in 20 seconds.

data.title: BigHex

data.author: chops

changelog.release_notes: removed leading 0 which was appearing in 12hr mode
tiny mod to BT off logo

more prominent bt off icon
24hr layout
new icon

data.description:
Simple digital layout, with the ability to flip direction if you wear your watch on the other wrist.  You can also have seconds on or off.

Designed primarily for 12hr time.  If your watch is in 24hr mode a basic (non-flip) layout will show.  To switch to time modes go to,
[menu>settings>date&time].

BT icon only shows when disconnected.
data.title: Digital 90 Flip

data.author: Franco van Gastel
data.description:
A watchface for teachers. 
Shows current time and date. 
Watchface countsdown until next end of lesson or lunchbreak. 5 minuten before the timer ends the watch vibrates so you are not suprised by the bell. 
Texts are in dutch and the watch is not configurable (yet).
data.title: School timer

data.author: Franco van Gastel
data.description:
De tijd en datum als Nederlandse tekst uitgeschreven. Je wisselt tussen tijd en datum door met het horloge te zwaaien. Terwijl de tekst via een animatie naar de juist plek beweegt.
Verder wordt de batterijstatus en Bluetooth connectie weergegeven.
data.title: Alles Tekst

data.author: kamby
data.description: Ganpati Bappa Morya
data.title: Jai Ganesh

data.author: 71codes

changelog.release_notes: First ever bangla watch face in this universe , some more features will coming soon :)

data.description: First ever Bangla watch in this universe :)

latest_release.release_notes: First ever bangla watch face in this universe , some more features will coming soon :)

data.title: Bangla Watch

data.author: Lukas Vermeer

changelog.release_notes: Added support for 12h time display format.
Now displays random selection from several mantras related to time and mindfulness.

data.description:
Simple Pebble watchface intended to encourage mindfulness of the present by discretely punctuating the constant passage of time.

Pebble will vibrate a unique pattern every five minutes to improve time perception by continuously indicating in unprompted fashion that a fixed duration of time has passed.

Inspired by Durr
http://skreksto.re/products/durr

latest_release.release_notes: Added support for 12h time display format.

data.title: We Are Here Now

data.author: WahooWatch

changelog.release_notes: Version 1.2 - removed first zero in 12-hour time so everything fits inside the logo.  May work on a fix for 24-hour time soon
Version 1.1 - resized logo to fit within screen completely

Version 1.0 - I MS painted a smash logo and put it on a watch.  Enjoy
Release date 5 September 2014

data.description: It's the super smash bros logo for your watch. #hype

latest_release.release_notes: Version 1.2 - removed first zero in 12-hour time so everything fits inside the logo.  May work on a fix for 24-hour time soon

data.title: Smash Logo

changelog.release_notes:
TMNT Watchface V1.0

Support for 12h and 24h.

data.description: You did a great job kicking Shredder's butt and now it's time to celebrate! Enjoy a slice of pizza with the Classic Era Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles!

latest_release.release_notes:
TMNT Watchface V1.0

Support for 12h and 24h.

data.title: TMNT Watchface

data.author: RHuffy

changelog.release_notes:
v1.0

Displays time remaining in, or time until each class period.
Configuration coming soon!

data.description:
This watchface allows you to enter in your daily schedule, and it displays how much time is remaining in the current time block.  A quick glance at your Pebble will tell you exactly how much time you have left in period 5, or how many minutes until your lunch break.  The ability to configure your own schedule will be added soon! 

NOTE: Thanks to everyone who has tried and liked my app.  I've been super busy with schoolwork, but I will fix the issues preventing the configuration page from working ASAP.

latest_release.release_notes:
v1.0

Displays time remaining in, or time until each class period.
Configuration coming soon!

data.title: School Schedule

data.author: EMFG
data.description:
Re-live the 1975 American Thriller JAWS every time you look at your watch!

This is an Unofficial Fan-made JAWS watchface.

Support for 12h and 24h.

data.description:

Now you can choose between Spanish, English, French, Italian, German, Portuguese and Dutch and change other features.

data.author: Jon

changelog.release_notes: ONLY - Changed Hosting of Config Page
Fix for city, sunrise and sunset data failing to update.
Fixed non-working config page - Decimal time should work now, Thanks for the heads up Sam!
Fixed GMT offset issue for areas with minute offset as well, i.e. 2.5 hours.

v0.60
-Added decimal time display
-Added config page on phone to toggle decimal time display
-Released source code, see http://goo.gl/Aje6D4 for more info

0.45
-First public release
-Work in progress
-Features to come
-Bugs included, I'm sure...

data.description:
A simple text watchface that shows local and Zulu/GMT time.

Features
-Local Time
-Zulu Time
-Decimal Time (Optional to display)
-Date
-Day/Night Coloring
-Bluetooth Connection Status
-Battery %  Status
-Sun Rise/Set Time
-More to come!

Please see website for full description and how to read the watch face.

Source is now released, head to website to get it!

latest_release.release_notes: ONLY - Changed Hosting of Config Page

data.title: Pilot's Zulu Time

changelog.release_notes:
Now for Pebble Time and Pebble classic.

Weather data resolved.
Solved one problem when you change options
Solved problems when we select the seconds option.
Solved problem with weather (change api of weather server).

FREday --> FRIday (in English version)

Thanks to Jesse Tampio!

Solved problems with weather synchronization.
Changes in design.
Less power consumption.

I've made some changes in design. Added humidity and pressure and the last time when this information readed (displayed before city).
Now it's possible use the 12h configuration with pebble settings.
Add weather information and I change the esthetic.
Minor changes in the config page (now it's remembered your preview selection)

Time, day, weather and battery in the same screen with possibility to choose language and the update time (minutes or seconds).

data.description: A very simple watchface for humans that think that it's quarter past three and not 3:17. So, it give you the time with a 5 minutes precision. There is also a dot showing you the seconds. This one is white if there is a bluetooth connection, otherwise it's black.

changelog.release_notes:
version 1.1
- adds the ability to show/hide the battery level and the date
- adds the option to display the time in a larger font
- adds the option to display everything in black-on-white as well as white-on-black

data.description:
A nice, calm, serene dot matrix watchface that displays all the information you need (date and time) without all the fuss.

This is one of the watchfaces that updates every second but that doesn't seem to be too much of a detriment to battery life in my experience.

Features a battery level indicator, including a "CH" indicator when charging and a "PL" indicator when plugged.

latest_release.release_notes:
version 1.1
- adds the ability to show/hide the battery level and the date
- adds the option to display the time in a larger font
- adds the option to display everything in black-on-white as well as white-on-black

data.description:
Geek The Time is the ultimate geek WatchFace for your Pebble!

- Check the time, bluetooth state, weather and battery!
- Read random quotes or custom sentences!
- Read headlines of XDA, TechCrunch, Android Police or Phandroid!
- Keep updated of your carrier or current IP!
- And much more!

changelog.release_notes: Eliminated setup. Now pebble gets the languaje from system and the colour is always black
Solved some problems with battery display
Now 12hr functionality. You must configure your watch for "12h" in the time display option.

data.description:
Description
Formula/equation on a blackboard. Under the root sign, are the hour and minutes. Below them a parenthesis enclosing the day of the month (numerator) the month number (denominator). Before that, two-letter week day. Up this, a number ranging from to 10 Indicates the remainig battery.

latest_release.release_notes: Eliminated setup. Now pebble gets the languaje from system and the colour is always black

data.title: Blackboard

data.author: Orologics

changelog.release_notes: 2.4 Fixed the numeric representation of lat/long for sidereal time calculation in the javascript.
2.3 Google geocode API now requires an app key. Fixes time zone changing issues. Removed shake to update location.
2.2 Updates location when it detects a time zone change. Also, shake to update current location.
No functional change. URL to settings updated.

data.description: Any Time is a fully configurable & dual-timezone watchface. The top half is your local time. Go into settings on your Pebble App to enter the alternate city or country, which will appear at the bottom half of the screen. Choose from 8 different heading styles and 6 different time displays. Great for travelers, pilots, ham radio operators and astronomers (Any Time calculates Sidereal Time). Background switches from black to white between 0600 and 1800, as a rough indication of daytime in that time zone.

latest_release.release_notes: 2.4 Fixed the numeric representation of lat/long for sidereal time calculation in the javascript.

data.title: Any Time Zone

data.author: chops
data.description:
This is an enhanced version of a much earlier generated watchface.

Have everything on, or have it all off (for a very minimal display)

You can do the following via settings - turn on/off the following,
 - screen invert
 - weather
 - seconds
 - day/date
 - battery bar
 - bluetooth vibe
 - hourly vibe

supports 12/24 hr modes
will only display a small bluetooth icon when disconnected
data.title: Big Digital 3

data.description:
Digital watchface that displays both Cannonian Time and standard time.

Cannonian Time is a metric time system, based on the premise of 100 hours in a day.
More information about Cannonian Time can be found at http://its.cannonianti.me/

changelog.release_notes: Leco Font, Grey background for black/white Pebbles

Complete Refactoring.
Now Pebble Round is supported
Added possibility to add background for Pebble Time

Fixed vibration when vibe on disconnect and app loaded
Fixed weather icons on Aplite with bright theme
Reduced res-size on Aplite

-Increased size of date
Formatting of time can now be set in settings on the watch.
-Needs less energy when music control is active
Fixed lots of Bugs, which appeared in the last update.

data.description: With the Pebble AllInOne Watchface you have all important information always on your watch. Additionally you can control your music using gestures! You know what the weather will be like, all important status of your phone like battery status, ringer status, signal strength and network connection. And you can see the next event of your calendars or the currently playing track. All on your watch!
data.title: AllInOne

data.description: Watch the day go by as a percentage. The day starts at 0%, at noon the time is 50%, and so on. One percent is equal to 14 minutes and 24 seconds.

data.author: chops
data.description:
Borrows from a similar watchface, 'diagonal', by dotar, and similar to the 'slanted' concept by firelighter.

ps. the un-eveness of text is intentional.

settings: invert, bluetooth vibe (with disconnect icon only), hourly vibe, blink, 12/24hr


"Angled Right" is also in the appstore.
data.title: Angled Left

data.author: Ryan Anderson
data.description: As you can tell by the name of the watch face it gives your watch a modern feel to itself. It is able to display time in both 12 and 24 hour formats. If you have any suggestions or features you believe should be added just go ahead and contact me from down below.
data.title: Modern Time

data.author: blackbug
data.description:
This watchface is on Terminator robot image.
It display 24 hour clock, along with month, day and date.

It indicates if the watch is connected to phone.
It also display the battery status.
data.title: Terminator

data.author: Fa
data.description:
Derived from ninety hank 2 (available on github) from hank, but:
* no week number (dev note: the code is still there, commented out)
* smaller and simpler moonphase (icon and "+" for growing, "-" for shrinking)
* no seconds (dev note: the cose is still there, commented out)
* weather icon and temperature
data.title: Ninety Fank

data.author: Matthew Hungerford
data.description:
Flick your wrist to power up CID.
Android boot animation featuring CID from Cyanogenmod, created by Xevin: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=o05PQRO1UW4

Thanks CyanogenMod Team for the amazing open-source rom.
data.title: CyanogenMod - CID animated watchface

data.author: MMazzocchi
data.description:
Just a bubbly, uplifting watchface!! Bubbles start from the bottom of the screen and rise up to the top; don't worry, they're see-through and don't block the time or date! If there's too many though, just tap the face to make them dissapear.

Now with inverted colors option! Tap the watch within the first ten seconds of opening and the face will invert.

Font for the time is Crackdown by Aenigma Fonts (http://www.1001freefonts.com/crackdown.font).
data.title: Bubbles

data.author: Milk Run

changelog.release_notes: Change from 24 hour to 12 hour time

data.description:
Uses Truchet tiling to display a pattern on the screen.

Shake or tap the pebble to switch between tiling patterns.

Twitter: @milk_run

latest_release.release_notes: Change from 24 hour to 12 hour time

data.title: Truchet

data.author: Vaibhav Viswanathan
data.description:
Now with QuickTap Plus!

This is a minimal watchface design. Shows the 24 hour time and the date in a light font. It notifies you when the Bluetooth is disconnected..

Shake your wrist to see more information: Battery status, Bluetooth Status, Weather.

data.description:
Displays day/night cycle, phases, and positions using a natural "horizon" style 24-hour analog face.

â¢ Sunrise / Sunset times from OpenWeatherMap.org
â¢ Calculated lunar phases
â¢ Approximates the position of the Sun and Moon relative to horizon when facing South (N. Hemisphere)
â¢ Local temperature (ÂºF)
â¢ Date (MM/DD)
â¢ Watch battery status
â¢ Both 24h digital and 24h analog

latest_release.release_notes: Added API key for OpenWeatherMap.org to restore weather and rise/set functionality.

data.title: Natural

data.author: Kipling Inscore

changelog.release_notes: This should fix the iOS app crash some users were experiencing.

data.description: Shows date and time in a format similar to Big Time. Top line is year, middle line is month (left two digits) and day (right two digits). Bottom line is hour and minute. Day of week in bottom-right corner (in what is otherwise the margin around the date & time).
data.title: Big Datetime

data.author: Anthony Biondo
data.description: A simple watchface based on Simplicity. It adds the day of the week, and icons that only appear when needed to indicate low battery or disconnected bluetooth.
data.title: Sensible

data.author: PixelSoup
data.description:
Simple watchface that displays the hour and a representation of each quarter of the hour through dots.
First Dot: 0-15 minutes
Second Dot: 15-30 minutes
Third Dot: 30-45 minutes
Fourth Dot: 45-60 minutes
data.title: ZenDots

data.author: betadecay
data.description:
WARNING: REQUIRES PHONE REBOOT AFTER INSTALL

Now CrimeWatch is available for the San Francisco Bay Area!

With CrimeWatch, you can tell if crime is just around the corner.

CrimeWatch tells you about the nearest crime. It tells you what it is and roughly on which street.

Requires GPS and internet connection. Updates automatically every 5 minutes or manually by shaking wrist.
data.title: CrimeWatch SanFran

data.author: Thom Ritterfeld

changelog.release_notes:
- Fixed bugs in updating rider texts.
- Dynamic updates, requests every year in July updates for the riders.

- Support for Pebble Time Round 
- Added timeline support for classic Pebble 
- Requesting the rider results of 2016

- Jersey mode: Select which jersey should be displayed. 
- Riders: See the current Tour de France rider that owns the jersey.
- Timeline: Get notifications if jerseys are changing ownership.

- Jersey mode: Select which jersey should be displayed.
- Riders: See the current Tour de France rider that owns the jersey.
- Timeline: Get notifications if jerseys are changing ownership.
- Fixed bug in auto inverter mode

- Pebble Time support!
- Added all jerseys of the Tour de France

- new segment time mode
- improvements in battery life
Time modes: Spokes, Single Spokes, Numbers

data.description:
Tour de France edition:
- All jerseys (Yellow, Green, Polka-Dot, White).
- Display the owners of the jerseys in real-time.
- Timeline updates and notifications when ownership is changing.

The Watchface shows the seconds, minutes and hours. The spokes in the left wheel are representing the hours, the spokes in the right wheel the minutes, and the peddling legs the seconds. It's also possible to invert black/colors. 
You can change all these settings by pressing the settings icon in your locker.
data.title: BiCycle - Tour de France

data.author: Tasnim Ahmed

changelog.release_notes: Removed pedometer because pebble's support for background activity apps. Some other optimizations are also done in the code.

- fixed / improved idle (sleep) timer algorithm
+ showing battery percentage on second screen
- decreased sensitivity of pedometer

(modified from Chunk Weather 2.1)
Will be on GitHub after code cleanup

+ Pedometer
+ Idle (sleep?) time meter
+ Flick to details screen
+ Forecast
+ Islamic Prayer times

data.description: This Watchface is a fork of Chunk Weather 2.1, I have added more details for weather like Humidity, Sunrise, Sunset; as well as other features from other watchfaces / apps. It adds a pedometer, idle(sleep?) time meter and Islamic prayer times with three day weather forecast on second screen accessible via flicking your wrist while wearing the pebble. Most things do not have labels :(
data.title: All in One

data.author: UTDESIGN
data.description:
This watchface displays time (24-hour mode only), date, day of the week.The time display position is displayed in the center of the vertical position of the Pebble Steel body.
This Free version does not have âauto commandâ function.
Paid version have âauto commandâ function like thisâhttp://youtu.be/CMpiG387CW8
When you shake your wrist, Pebble displays the time a few seconds. Please buy paid version from website.
data.title: AUTO_COMMAND_Free

data.title: Saltire

data.author: Lee Turner

changelog.release_notes: Updated javascript to be more lean

data.description:
Gives the Displays the Air Quality Index (AQI) of the current Chinese city you are in on the bottom right of the screen and the current temperature in the bottom left.

Data for AQI is from http://www.pm25.in
Data for the weather is from http://openweathermap.org
Inspired by Maverick Stoklosa's Shanghai Pollution watchface

latest_release.release_notes: Updated javascript to be more lean

data.title: China AQI Watchface

data.author: Syxball

changelog.release_notes: First watchface and first one which I think is OK to be made public. Simple watchface so far which includes the time, date and Arsenal logo.

data.description: Simple watchface which has time, date & Arsenal logo.

latest_release.release_notes: First watchface and first one which I think is OK to be made public. Simple watchface so far which includes the time, date and Arsenal logo.

data.title: Arsenal

data.author: Tim Emanuel
data.description: A simple face I did just to learn development, but it works so I thought I'd make it available. It's got date, time, a progress bar for seconds, battery level and a lightning bolt when charging. It's the first C I've written for years, so any feedback would be welcome.
data.title: Second Progress

data.description: A simple watchface design based on the united kingdom's flag.
